content.text: table is designed to store audit logs related to agency divisions. It captures changes and actions performed on agency division records, likely for compliance, tracking, and historical analysis purposes. The table includes metadata about the changes, such as timestamps, user information, and specific attributes of the agency division.
The complexity of this table is considered medium due to the following factors:
It includes a variety of data types and default constraints.
It utilizes user-defined functions for default values, which adds a layer of complexity.
The table is part of an audit schema, indicating it is used for tracking changes, which inherently involves more complexity than simple transactional tables.
